chat-utils.configs.copyToClipboardMessag: Message shown in the tooltip when copying messages.
chat-utils.configs.previewContent.label: Preview Content
chat-utils.configs.previewContent.descri: Whether or not to preview content in the copy message tooltip.
chat-utils.configs.copyColorsIfAny.label: Copy Color Codes
chat-utils.configs.copyColorsIfAny.descr: Whether or not to copy color codes.
chat-utils.configs.copyHexColors.label: Copy HEX Color Codes
chat-utils.configs.copyHexColors.descrip: If disabled, copied colors will be down sampled to the closest legacy color code. Only works if "copyColorsIfAny" is enabled.
chat-utils.configs.antiSpam.label: Anti-Spam
chat-utils.configs.antiSpamRange.label: Anti-Spam Range
chat-utils.configs.antiSpamRange.descrip: Chat Anti-Spam only triggers when messages are within this range from the latest message.
chat-utils.configs.tooltipEnabled.label: Enable Copy To Clipboard Tooltip
chat-utils.configs.tooltipEnabled.descri: Click to disable any sort of tooltip when hovering over a message.
chat-utils.configs.enabled.label: Enable Copy To Clipboard
chat-utils.configs.enabled.description: Click to disable chat-utils for compatibility issues.
chat-utils.configs.enableChatPersist.des: Saves chat from previous server sessions when logging back in later.
Saves commands/sent chat from previous server sessions when logging back in later.
chat-utils.configs.enableCopyKey.label: Enable Copy Key
chat-utils.configs.enableCopyKey.descrip: Forces you to hold the key set under "Copy Key" to copy a message.
chat-utils.configs.copyKey.label: Copy Key
chat-utils.configs.copyKey.description: Key to hold upon message copy (none for direct click)
